• A+ and Editor's Choice rating from Children's Technology Review - "Powerful and free, this rich language experience lets you create your own self-narrated puppet shows."
• Winner of the 2017 BolognaRagazzi Digital Award for 'Best Kids App of the Year'

comments: On the advert it looks like the best game and I get two disco balls each time and merge them together and you've completed the level. Then you get the game and that rarely even happens! It's only happened once to me and I'm on level 41. Now that's saying something. It gives you a super good promise and nope it's gone out the window as soon as you get the game

I have been playing for a while now, I like almost all of the game, not too impressed that "the piggy bank " is basically held to ransom until you buy it... find another way to entice spending... reduce number of coins won or something but as the levels get hard if you dont spend money you get stuck even with team helps.. it gets disheartening and reduces interest after a while.. to the gamemakers: keep the game playable..the money will come

Although this game is addictive and sometimes fun, it seems the producers of the game are greedily taking advantage of people and getting them to pay money for things not worth it(but they feel the pressure to do so, so they do it). Some things in this game are deliberately set up to make the player fail and become desperate to play on and spend. The Champions League is a poor idea which produces terrible prizes for high ranks, and is just a replay of previous played levels which is a let down.

Update...as I go though the levels Ill get stuck for a day or two...even 3 on a level. Gameplay FUN has Dropped significantly. Moved to 3 stars as a result. If it does not change I'll continue to move to 1 star. Games are many to be played...not just stuck on a level forever!  Other issue with the game is that there's so much clicking and waiting once you win. I wish that it would just go right to the next level and it wouldn't have to wait for the splash screen. I just spend so much time wasted versus playing

It's fast and fun so much better than the other new ones. I love playing it. Thank u so much for all your work and the time spent making it a blast to play.  PS getting past level 80 isn't  possible so I quit. Made me so sad.

Don't waste your time playing this game.  I got too 300 + levels but you get 100 coins for completing each level.  Unfortunately it goes in a piggy bank, which you need to pay to break starting from £1.99, then next piggy bank was £4.99.  It's a con!

comments: Okay. This game is VERY visually active, its beautiful, it really is. But there's too much going on. At least on the first (level?), like you cant tell what's coming at you too well. It's all trippy and wavy and lights and everything looks really good, but it almost completely obscures your vision. And I normally don't have problems with that. Ever. But this game man... Its almost not fair, the environment is surrounded with white and red shapes that just float through the air, coincidentally resembling the white squares and red poles that you're supposed to hit/avoid. All you see is a blur of red and white. Maybe you should hit it, maybe you shouldn't. Who the f*** knows...

This game is very amazing, and accurate with everything! The slopes, obstacles, color changes, and the points all seem accurate to any song. Like how it does work with any mp3. Small problems with songs with lyrics, but I do not listen to much of those anyways (I take that back there is no problem actually). It is amazing! I would really be appreciated if you made more styles AbstractArt! Great especially for a unity made mobile game.

When I clicked on the "Music" category, I was very bored. I was not expecting to find a game that perfectly combined my love for good music and video games. From playing mostly idle games and simulation games, this is by far my new favorite and boy am I surprised. I can't wait to throw my most interesting music in. Thank you for making this game.

I love how amazing it looks! I'd love of you added something to change the colors though, as the continuous orange hurts my eyes after a short while. This may sound a bit picky,  but would it be possible to make the game run 60 fps? The low setting runs the same as the high setting for me. Just wondering 🤣

Great. Beautiful menu score. Great levels. I would easily pay $50 for some more levels. Maybe a warrior lady riding a luck dragon from never ending story? Something oozing with 80's. Or a Tron cycle.  Tron like dragon in a flying level.  Please! But yeay this app eats up my time and is very therapeutic.

This game just broke my expectations. I expected another game that claims it adapts to the music and to the beat, but in the end it's just a crappy premade map. Damn I was wrong... I was amazed to see that it really was changing to the music. The art is just so fitting for retrowave music and it makes you fully experience it. The concept is simple, but interesting and it lets you enjoy the ride. I definetly recommend this game to anyone. My only problem is that it has too little content to buy with in-game currency, but it's understandable as it's a new game. I would love more maps, maybe more game modes and obviously more cars. Thanks to the creators of this awesome game. Good job guys.

comments: This game is moderated by children who have too much vested interest in the game to be unbiased. They also antagonize players in chat instigating discord, and then abusing their powers.

I am rating on my experience the last 2 years. The game was great, nice twch upgrades, nice unit characteristics up grades with the tuning of armor and energy adaptors and all loved. My original file that ive been playing with that was very active was deleted during server maintenance about a year ago now. I did register so it irritated me to the point where I wanted nothing to do with the game or the development group. The last 3 days ive given it a try again and its still great except one thing. This play keeps attacking me but his tech is way higher then mine. By as little as 450% and as high as 600% higher. Technically, as I understand the power level system, he shouldnt even get passed probing my planet. Im only now getting to 90% on tech lvl and hes farming me at like 443% weapons, 560% strength, and 638% sheilds techs. It will be more fun to play if that could be fixed. Love it other wise.
I hate an app that requires to have access to your contacts photos to play. Be careful if you play this game

Played for 5 years, spent alot of money. Quit the day I found out Russian players were getting free credits. Reported it to devs and no action was taken. The same players getting free credits were also allowed to glitch fleets and hide their planets in invulnerable locations to grow untouched and without consequences. Tap4fun don't enforce their ToS. Be warned, stay away.

Needs unnecessary access to your device including monitoring and making calls. Why would you need that? And why do you need access to my photos?   This maybe a good game but to me this is a invasion of privacy

The game itself is pretty good, however over last few days I've been getting problems with logging in,says connection issues or something, tho I'm connected to wifi. Rating 2 until my connection issues are fixed

description: Plunge into the world of adventures, despair, unstable platforms and infinite artful traps together with 8 bit simulator Trap adventure: Part 2 which will ship you in the world of sufferings and constant restart of each level. Whether you are ready to adventure the nerves and to play in classical 8 bit platformer Trap adventure: Part 2? Know that not each player who has begun an adventure in our world of traps is capable to pass and jump him till the end. So what you are ready to adventure to finish an trap adventure and to receive a valuable award? A trap adventure 2 game in the world in which you will destroy the nerves. Prepare for an improbable trap adventure in the artful and unpredictable world of a game! In Trap adventure: Part 2 the player is faced by a task simple in appearance: to spend the hero on level, jumping according to various platforms and avoiding at the same time various traps and cunning mechanisms. But whether so just to survive during a trap adventure how it seems at first sight? Your adventure will end also suddenly, as well as has begun as dangerous and very hardcore traps will trap you literally everywhere. And you will fail again and again, and … again. Each level this classical 8 bit platformer will turn for you into the real torture. You will hate all traps occurring in the path. And from it will be even more cheerful! Classical platformer Trap adventure: Part 2 is an adventure not of your hero, it is 8 bit a trap adventure! Your hero who is looking for adventures in the world of artful traps should jump and squat constantly to avoid activation of a trap or hit in it. And how far the hero and at what moment his dangerous adventure in the world of traps will end will be able to get, depends only on reaction and attentiveness of the player! The quicker the player will solve a riddle of traps at the level, the quicker the hero will be able to reach the end of level to get to the first trap at the new level! Whether you will adventure everything or you will curtail from a way of traps, without having learned, than everything will end in the world of 8 bit platformer Trap adventure: Part 2? Trap adventure 2 in the world on a hardcore and complexity a game. Whether you will be able to overcome all traps and at what moment your adventure will end? Whether you are ready to risk the dream, nerves and time to pass up to the end a trap adventure? Who will win: a trap or the hero who is looking for adventures? Now we learn it in hardcore 8 bit platformer Trap adventure: Part 2!

And how far the hero and at what moment his dangerous adventure in the world of traps will end will be able to get, depends only on reaction and attentiveness of the player! The quicker the player will solve a riddle of traps at the level, the quicker the hero will be able to reach the end of level to get to the first trap at the new level! Whether you will adventure everything or you will curtail from a way of traps, without having learned, than everything will end in the world of 8 bit platformer Trap adventure: Part 2?

Trap adventure 2 in the world on a hardcore and complexity a game. Whether you will be able to overcome all traps and at what moment your adventure will end? Whether you are ready to risk the dream, nerves and time to pass up to the end a trap adventure? Who will win: a trap or the hero who is looking for adventures? Now we learn it in hardcore 8 bit platformer Trap adventure: Part 2!
summary: Immerse yourself in a world of adventures and endless treacherous traps
title: Trap adventure: Part 2

comments: I love this game and I play it all day long. I love the game play in it as it's very addictive and all the awards you get motivates you to keep playing on and achieving higher levels. I gave this a four star rating because the only problem with this game is how much is crashes and struggles to maintain server connection. You can restart the game and it'll fix but it'll happen very easily again and there's even times you have to restart the game multiple times for it to work again. If this game will be able to maintain server connection at all times and not crash as much then this game will be worth five stars and more people will play it guaranteed.

Typical idle RPG. Nothing special or new compared to all the other stat grinders avail. Major connection issues, lag and server instability. Sometimes I can log in with no issue, mostly it takes 4 or 5 tries to even connect...staying connected is another issue all together...
EZ PZ CRASH n FREEZY  Seriously servers can't maintain a connection for more then 3 minutes.. literally log in, do one thing, time out, relog repeat.. don't waste your time or money on this
Now I give 1 star. How can you enjoy and play a game if it crashes all the time? I can only play 5 minutes and then it crashes. WORST GAME EVER

Love the game, but just started on server 2 and game crashes any time you leave the battle page, it's near impossible to progress. I've lost countless rewards in mail, if you claim them and the app crashes there gone for ever lost hundreds of gens from arena as well, even lost my Facebook share reward this way too. There's times the game will crash and I will lose hundreds of thousands of xp, really like the game and wanna spend but I refuse to spend if I can't even claim simple in game rewards.

It is very buggy. At times when you do something it will crash and keep trying to load it. Making you have to close and reopen. Not recommended making any in game until fixed. In game purchases work on Chinese tier system. More you buy better stuff you get.

description: Looking for Amazing Spider Super Hero Time? Super Spider Hero: Amazing Spider Super Hero Time by Kool Games is the game for you. A US Army Super Spider Hero becomes an Amazing Spider Super Hero Time in this superhero game. Super Spider Hero: Amazing Spider Super Hero Time by Kool Games is going to fulfill all you superhero needs.Background story of this superhero game:A US Army superhero has been moved from bounty hunting situation in a city where monster shooting for monster killing was required. The monster Killer / monster shooter has now been brought to bounty hunting situation in a freezing jungle where monster shooting for monster killing is required to save the jungle from the monsters.What is this SuperHero Game all about:This bounty hunting game depicts monster shooting and monster killing by an army soldier. This game has different monster hunting objectives. Each level in this spider game has an interesting elimination objective for the monster killer. There are 2 modes for the monster killer each mode having different levels for monster shooter in this monster game. More modes may be added to this spider game in future. Your mission in this spider game as a monster shooter is to do monster shooting and monster killing to save the jungle from the monsters.How to play this Monster Killer Game of Monster Hunting?You will be provided with different skills for monster hunting to keep yourself safe from the monsters. Use the following skills as forest hunter:1. Set your direction in the line with the target monster.2. Aim well and try to hit accurately to finish the monster in one hit.3. Touch the attack button to eliminate the target monster.4. As this forest hunter game has different levels so complete the objective set for a certain level to successfully unlock next level of this hunting game.5. Once you have cleared a level in this forest hunter game, you can always come back and give it another shot to better your previous mission accomplishment time in this monster game.Why play this forest hunter by Kool Games?You are surely going to love this hunting game over the others due to following salient features:1. Totally Free: This monster game is totally free!2. Delightful graphics: This hunt game has awesome graphics. The graphics are high quality as well as very smooth so you are going to have your best gaming experience in this great game.3. Entertaining music: This hunting game has a very entertaining music!.4. Very realistic sound effects: The sound effects in this monster game are very realistic and they keep you fully engaged in this killer game.5. Top Quality Fun: Its great fun to play this spider game as the aim is to save the jungle from the monsters.6. Realistic Missions: The mission associated with each level of this killer game is very realistic and it throws you in the real world while keeping you fully involved. Each mission in this spider game is time bound with a specific elimination target of monsters to keep you focused on the job at hand.7. Player Feedback: Kool Games is always looking forward to your feedback on this US hunter game and try our best to make your gaming experience more and more interesting.Who should play this monster game?Anybody who wants a challenge to keep himself safe from the monsters should play this game and establish the basic skills in the simulating environment mapping to the real world. Everyone else looking for endless hunt of monsters is also welcome to play this killer game.When to play this US hunter game?This game can be played at any time during the day or during the night. You are at office or at home, wherever you are free for monster hunting, just pull out your mobile and enjoy playing this killer game.Kindly do not forget to provide the rating for this hunt game as per your hunting game experience and you can also suggest improvements in your feedback/ review comments of this game.Enjoy the FOREST HUNTER game.
descriptionHTML:
Looking for Amazing Spider Super Hero Time? Super Spider Hero: Amazing Spider Super Hero Time by Kool Games is the game for you. A US Army Super Spider Hero becomes an Amazing Spider Super Hero Time in this superhero game. Super Spider Hero: Amazing Spider Super Hero Time by Kool Games is going to fulfill all you superhero needs.

Background story of this superhero game:

A US Army superhero has been moved from bounty hunting situation in a city where monster shooting for monster killing was required. The monster Killer / monster shooter has now been brought to bounty hunting situation in a freezing jungle where monster shooting for monster killing is required to save the jungle from the monsters.

What is this SuperHero Game all about:

This bounty hunting game depicts monster shooting and monster killing by an army soldier. This game has different monster hunting objectives. Each level in this spider game has an interesting elimination objective for the monster killer. There are 2 modes for the monster killer each mode having different levels for monster shooter in this monster game. More modes may be added to this spider game in future. Your mission in this spider game as a monster shooter is to do monster shooting and monster killing to save the jungle from the monsters.

How to play this Monster Killer Game of Monster Hunting?

You will be provided with different skills for monster hunting to keep yourself safe from the monsters. Use the following skills as forest hunter:

1. Set your direction in the line with the target monster.

2. Aim well and try to hit accurately to finish the monster in one hit.

3. Touch the attack button to eliminate the target monster.

4. As this forest hunter game has different levels so complete the objective set for a certain level to successfully unlock next level of this hunting game.

5. Once you have cleared a level in this forest hunter game, you can always come back and give it another shot to better your previous mission accomplishment time in this monster game.

Why play this forest hunter by Kool Games?

You are surely going to love this hunting game over the others due to following salient features:

1. Totally Free: This monster game is totally free!

2. Delightful graphics: This hunt game has awesome graphics. The graphics are high quality as well as very smooth so you are going to have your best gaming experience in this great game.

3. Entertaining music: This hunting game has a very entertaining music!.

4. Very realistic sound effects: The sound effects in this monster game are very realistic and they keep you fully engaged in this killer game.

5. Top Quality Fun: Its great fun to play this spider game as the aim is to save the jungle from the monsters.

6. Realistic Missions: The mission associated with each level of this killer game is very realistic and it throws you in the real world while keeping you fully involved. Each mission in this spider game is time bound with a specific elimination target of monsters to keep you focused on the job at hand.

7. Player Feedback: Kool Games is always looking forward to your feedback on this US hunter game and try our best to make your gaming experience more and more interesting.

Who should play this monster game?

Anybody who wants a challenge to keep himself safe from the monsters should play this game and establish the basic skills in the simulating environment mapping to the real world. Everyone else looking for endless hunt of monsters is also welcome to play this killer game.

When to play this US hunter game?

This game can be played at any time during the day or during the night. You are at office or at home, wherever you are free for monster hunting, just pull out your mobile and enjoy playing this killer game.

Kindly do not forget to provide the rating for this hunt game as per your hunting game experience and you can also suggest improvements in your feedback/ review comments of this game.

Enjoy the FOREST HUNTER game.

title: Super Spider Hero: Amazing Spider Super Hero Time

description: This game is perfect for learning all the countries' capitals or for testing you knowledge: -	Several game modes are available: world quiz, quiz by contient... -	And a challenge for those who like competition! -      You can review and learn the countries' capitals using the list mode. -	It contains the capitals of the 199 countries. -	It is user friendly.When playing quiz, the point of the game is to get as many correct answers as possible, with 3 wrong answers allowed.When playing challenge, you have a limited time to guess a maximum capitals possible.Will you succeed to reach the best score?
descriptionHTML:
This game is perfect for learning all the countries' capitals or for testing you knowledge:
- Several game modes are available: world quiz, quiz by contient...
- And a challenge for those who like competition!
- You can review and learn the countries' capitals using the list mode.
- It contains the capitals of the 199 countries.
- It is user friendly.

When playing quiz, the point of the game is to get as many correct answers as possible, with 3 wrong answers allowed.
When playing challenge, you have a limited time to guess a maximum capitals possible.

Will you succeed to reach the best score?
summary: Quiz of the countries' capitals of the world
title: Capitals of the countries - Quiz

comments: I play this game regularly, and I enjoy the differing modes available. You can play happily without paying for any additional content, however at higher levels paying will help you progress. By this time you will have poured hours into it, so I do not think it is unreasonable. Save your gold until later levels (player level 15+) and you can get by without in game purchases for quite a while.

I absolutely love this game. Turn based tactics are one of my favourite types of games. Since playing the game more I've decided that there's not enough gas for me to be able to enjoy the game like I want to. I think the car should either hold more, or gas should be easier to get. This is just a game that already has inconsistencies with reality. Otherwise I love the game

Just loved it... I am at council level 18 now... Weapon upgrade xp cost should be reduced or just remove workshop. No use of WORKSHOP with such high xp cost because its REASONABLE to upgrade your SURVIVOR than their WEAPONS.... Please for next update reduce weapon upgrade cost....

Great game, been playing for five months now and have managed to get all but 5 hero's unlocked. Lots of chances to save up radios for hero calls and love the different types of game especially the guild.  Haven't spent a penny on it and don't think you need to if you have a little patience and use your resources wisely.

I have this game, and I play this more than watching the actual show. You can bring together a motley crew of survivors for missions and get gear to make them stronger. Build a camp, in order to multiply resources, because you will need them to improve other buildings. Also, to note, this game will not allow you to get stronger unless you improve your camp. I have survivors who cannot level up until I Improve the council. The training grounds will not be built any further unless you improve the council. Its like a city/fort building game with tactical rpg feel to it.  There is a leaderboard, that actually awards you for being at a certain tier. You can join guilds to help get better gear. I love this game!  ...The con that I have with this is that every time of logging on, deals are thrown in my face, and it is enticing too.

I've been playing this game for two years now and I can never put it down. It's such an amazing game. I'd like it even more though if the characters we originally fell in love with were available. Like Andrea, T-Dog, Lori, etc.
description: Play now with Daryl, Rick, Michonne and many other characters of AMC’s The Walking Dead! Collect Heroes through radio calls and unlock special abilities and valuable leader traits. Complete Episode 1 for free Daryl tokens and unlock the first Hero of your team!The Walking Dead: No Man’s Land is a thrilling, action-packed RPG where tactical choices make the difference between life and death. Only the strongest will survive so choose your team wisely: bring Michonne and dominate in close-quarter combat or send Rick to dispatch enemies from afar. Or perhaps you’ll choose to snipe from a distance with Daryl’s crossbow, or mow the herd down with Abraham’s assault rifle. • FIGHT through hordes of deadly enemies in tactical turn-based combat• COLLECT and upgrade your favorite characters from AMC’s The Walking Dead• CHOOSE the right team and the equipment for each mission• HUNT walkers in Terminus, The Prison and other familiar locations from AMC’s The Walking Dead • JOIN other players in deadly weekly challenges and PVP combat for exclusive rewards“Throw in some pretty swish graphics, lovely animations and blood splatters, and you have one of the most carefully fleshed out zombie games we've seen on mobile. It looks lovely, and plays great too.” - Pocketgamer“Each aspect of survival on AMC's The Walking Dead has been parallel to the series' official mobile game, subtitled No Man's Land.” - Mashable“Imagine your favorite mobile base-building strategy game, mix in a dash of XCOM, and then paint on a fresh coat of AMC’s The Walking Dead. That’s No Man’s Land in a nutshell.” - GamezeboFor more, please visit:http://www.facebook.com/thewalkingdeadnomanslandhttp://twitter.com/twdnomanslandhttp://www.thewalkingdeadnomansland.comhttp://www.youtube.com/nxtgmsFor player support, please visit:nextgames.helpshift.com
descriptionHTML:
Play now with Daryl, Rick, Michonne and many other characters of AMC’s The Walking Dead! Collect Heroes through radio calls and unlock special abilities and valuable leader traits. Complete Episode 1 for free Daryl tokens and unlock the first Hero of your team!

The Walking Dead: No Man’s Land is a thrilling, action-packed RPG where tactical choices make the difference between life and death. Only the strongest will survive so choose your team wisely: bring Michonne and dominate in close-quarter combat or send Rick to dispatch enemies from afar. Or perhaps you’ll choose to snipe from a distance with Daryl’s crossbow, or mow the herd down with Abraham’s assault rifle.

• FIGHT through hordes of deadly enemies in tactical turn-based combat
• COLLECT and upgrade your favorite characters from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• CHOOSE the right team and the equipment for each mission
• HUNT walkers in Terminus, The Prison and other familiar locations from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• JOIN other players in deadly weekly challenges and PVP combat for exclusive rewards

“Throw in some pretty swish graphics, lovely animations and blood splatters, and you have one of the most carefully fleshed out zombie games we've seen on mobile. It looks lovely, and plays great too.” - Pocketgamer

“Each aspect of survival on AMC's The Walking Dead has been parallel to the series' official mobile game, subtitled No Man's Land.” - Mashable

“Imagine your favorite mobile base-building strategy game, mix in a dash of XCOM, and then paint on a fresh coat of AMC’s The Walking Dead. That’s No Man’s Land in a nutshell.” - Gamezebo

description: Step into a PEPI HOSPITAL and become doctor, patient or just a curious explorer! Our new addition to a rich family of PEPI PLAY games offers a vast medical centre with tons of items, activities and ways to play. Join our characters in their workplace, soothe and treat patients, create Your own stories, discover and understand the everyday routines of a busy hospital.MEET THE PEPI BOTWe're delighted to introduce a medical Pepi Bot, our new character built to accompany little players in our games. Pepi Bot is a cute, versatile friend able to follow you around the building and provide immediate help, to You and Your patients. Armed with the latest tech, Pepi Bot is a perfect sidekick to Your interactive stories. Cute little droid will provide medical tools and even carry a wardrobe for all those moments when you feel like playing in style!TONS OF ACTIONExperience the daily life of a hospital full of action - from the small and cosy cafe to a busy pharmacy shop or the operating room, there are various experiences for players to toy with. Ambulance car will arrive regularly with new patients to take care of and new friends to meet. Only the most curious players will be able to find all the ways to treat their patients. This offers an amazing opportunity to set up various scenarios to take part in.FUN & EDUCATIONALEven though the game is dedicated to a young audience, everybody can and should find a way to join in. The game encourages parents to play together and use the games educational values - while your child is discovering the opportunities throughout all 4 floors of the hospital, you can help him by moderating their experiences, creating and going through character stories, explaining the nature and use of items, expanding child’s vocabulary and basic medicinal knowledge.  HUNDREDS OF INTERACTIVE OBJECTSEnhance your gameplay with hundreds of interactive objects that can be easily transferred through floors. Medical instruments, toys and even yoga balls can be given to the dwellers of Pepi Hospital for the most unpredictable results. Not to mention many opportunities to dress up your favourite characters!COLORFUL AND UNIQUE CHARACTERSPEPI HOSPITAL has a wide variety of characters. Dozens of cute, cheerful and unique humans, pets, monsters and aliens are there to have fun and join your playful exploration of the Hospital building.FEATURES• Vast medical centre packed with tons of items and machines!• Multifunctional companion bot.• Run your own lab — measure blood pressure, perform X-ray scans and much more!• Get comfy in customisable dentist chair. • Become physical therapist, create your own fitness routines!• Be among the first to welcome babies into the world. Weight and take a good care of them!• Listen to Hospital dwellers talking on the phone. Each in his own unique way!• Play with fishes while waiting at the reception.• Ambulance regularly delivers new patients.
descriptionHTML:
Step into a PEPI HOSPITAL and become doctor, patient or just a curious explorer! Our new addition to a rich family of PEPI PLAY games offers a vast medical centre with tons of items, activities and ways to play. Join our characters in their workplace, soothe and treat patients, create Your own stories, discover and understand the everyday routines of a busy hospital.

MEET THE PEPI BOT

We're delighted to introduce a medical Pepi Bot, our new character built to accompany little players in our games. Pepi Bot is a cute, versatile friend able to follow you around the building and provide immediate help, to You and Your patients. Armed with the latest tech, Pepi Bot is a perfect sidekick to Your interactive stories. Cute little droid will provide medical tools and even carry a wardrobe for all those moments when you feel like playing in style!

TONS OF ACTION

Experience the daily life of a hospital full of action - from the small and cosy cafe to a busy pharmacy shop or the operating room, there are various experiences for players to toy with. Ambulance car will arrive regularly with new patients to take care of and new friends to meet. Only the most curious players will be able to find all the ways to treat their patients. This offers an amazing opportunity to set up various scenarios to take part in.

FUN & EDUCATIONAL

Even though the game is dedicated to a young audience, everybody can and should find a way to join in. The game encourages parents to play together and use the games educational values - while your child is discovering the opportunities throughout all 4 floors of the hospital, you can help him by moderating their experiences, creating and going through character stories, explaining the nature and use of items, expanding child’s vocabulary and basic medicinal knowledge.

HUNDREDS OF INTERACTIVE OBJECTS

Enhance your gameplay with hundreds of interactive objects that can be easily transferred through floors. Medical instruments, toys and even yoga balls can be given to the dwellers of Pepi Hospital for the most unpredictable results. Not to mention many opportunities to dress up your favourite characters!

COLORFUL AND UNIQUE CHARACTERS

PEPI HOSPITAL has a wide variety of characters. Dozens of cute, cheerful and unique humans, pets, monsters and aliens are there to have fun and join your playful exploration of the Hospital building.

FEATURES

• Vast medical centre packed with tons of items and machines!

descriptionHTML:
Start your construction today! Create your infinite fictional world!

Enjoy this endless paradise.

Build, destroy, move, fly, jump and craft. And all this for free !!!

There are over 100 different items in your inventory to build separate rooms including a living room, bedroom, toilet, bathroom, a private garden, a house for animals.

Easily place the standard blocks that you want to install and use them to build something, you can build everything you can imagine.

Choose creativity or survival mode, move through your world and make it more remarkable.

Move through this endless world in flight, save your work, and play again later.

Everyone loves Kraft games, they have become popular all over the world; You can start with a few blocks and gradually build an empire.

Explore and start developing your dream. You can use many different items, so you can create your ideal Kingdom. The game is infinite, which makes it so intriguing.

★★★★★ PLEASE RATE THIS GAME WITH 5 STARS★★★★★

For those who still see the error at the beginning. Go into the settings of your phone. Selects programs and games. Look for our game: Exploration Prime. Choose this. Then you can grant permissions to the game. Then you need to give the game permission to write to your storage. After that, the game will work.

Enjoy!

The game Exploration Prime is an open source project which is subject to the LGPLv3 license. Before using the code, you must read the entire license and agree to it.

description: ★★★★★  Welcome to Horsecraft!  ★★★★★Are you looking for adventures? Want to ride a horse through the prairie into the sunset? Or do you want to be able to do magic? Maybe you want to build a farm? All this and much more can be found in our new game Horsecraft.There are wolves, cats, horses, rabbits, cows, pigs, sheep and much more.Find gold, diamonds, stones, raw materials, wood and make whatever you want, for example Strong Ax, Deadly Sword, Lightning-fast Bow, or build something beautiful, e.g. A house, a farm, a village, or even a city.There is much to discover and explore. It becomes particularly interesting in survival mode, where you are on your own and should create everything yourself.Let's go. Have a lot of fun. And please do not forget to leave a Comment. Because I'm happy about your opinion and want to hear from you what you like about my game and what I could possibly improve.In addition, I would like to ask you, if you naturally have a desire to translate the description of the game to your own language without errors and send me this to my email. That would be a big help for me. Many Thanks!!!
descriptionHTML:
★★★★★ Welcome to Horsecraft! ★★★★★

Are you looking for adventures? Want to ride a horse through the prairie into the sunset? Or do you want to be able to do magic? Maybe you want to build a farm? All this and much more can be found in our new game Horsecraft.

There are wolves, cats, horses, rabbits, cows, pigs, sheep and much more.
Find gold, diamonds, stones, raw materials, wood and make whatever you want, for example Strong Ax, Deadly Sword, Lightning-fast Bow, or build something beautiful, e.g. A house, a farm, a village, or even a city.

There is much to discover and explore. It becomes particularly interesting in survival mode, where you are on your own and should create everything yourself.

Let's go. Have a lot of fun. And please do not forget to leave a Comment. Because I'm happy about your opinion and want to hear from you what you like about my game and what I could possibly improve.

In addition, I would like to ask you, if you naturally have a desire to translate the description of the game to your own language without errors and send me this to my email. That would be a big help for me. Many Thanks!!!

comments: Love the game, easy to understand and they have videos on how to use the equipment and make ur farm expand. Also, their customer service is great!!  Recently my phone was stole and had to get a new phone.  Familyfarm helped me recover my farm within a couple of days.  Their services were quick and resourceful.

Fun game, but...What happened?  Don't like the snow,  it lightened all the colors of everything, they are not as vivid as they usually are.. With cataracts,  too hard on eyes,  all print got really small and can't read anymore.  Will have to quit til eyes get fixed.

I love the game and have played it for almost 5 years now but for some reason it will not connect to facebook. Not sure what happened in the last update. Hopefully it gets fixed soon. I would hate if my phone got messed up and my progress is not saved

The game used to be good but it has been hanging up repeatedly with the recent updates. Open a treasure chest/daily chest to get a reward will forever be loading and not running. Have to shut down the whole game and redo the quests again. Auto-save for the game had also been unstable, with us having to redo the stuff that we have done previously. It's very frustrating given that we have planted some crops and only to realise that the crops we had planted were not actually planted when we revisit the farm to harvest those crops.

This game was good and fine then it crashed and when I reopened it it had lost all my progress from level 36 to 21. What a waste of time so annoyed. How the hell do i get my game back? It looks like it connected to a Facebook account and loaded an old game but I don't gave the option to disconnect. So frustrated!

This was my favorite game but lately it has so many problems. Things I've completed keep DISSAPPERING and I have to keep redoing them to move on in the game. I've been asking for help for a few months now. Also there are tons and tons of issues with the game crashing. I've done everything to fix this that I was told to do yet nothing is working. As for contacting the link sent to the reply to this I've also done that a few times now with no help. I've been using the in game help tab and keep getting told its been sent to another help team. I've spent Way too much real money on this game and if not fixed soon will want it all back and the deleting the game.   Please fix this so once again I can give it 5 stars. Since the last update the game is now closing in it's own. This is very frustrating. So again as I've asked above please fix this .

descriptionHTML:
Beautiful and fun farming simulation game. Raise cute farm animals and harvest diverse crops to make your farm a success! It's up to you to make your dream farm by the seaside. Start building your dream farm now.

■■ Game Features ■■
✓ Played by over 60 million people all around the world!
✓ Tired of upgrading the Barn? Enjoy unlimited Barn space.
✓ Prepare more than 400+ dishes in the kitchen.
✓ Plant, harvest and produce over 200+ unique products!
✓ Compete with other farmers in the new Farm Beauty Contest!
✓ Daily orders and new missions added regularly for more fun!
✓ 500+ unique, cute, and well-designed decorations!
✓ Adopt pets and costume them with pet apparel and equipment. Now you can breed pets to make new baby pets!
✓ Exotic Island Farm: Explore a Mine, Garden!
✓ Marine Sea Resort: You are now the owner of the Sea Resort! Complete resort orders and build the best resort for visitors to come to!
✓ Visit neighbors' farms and sample their newest dishes to earn prizes, help clean decorations, and trade for needed farm products!

Family Farm Seaside supports 21 languages including; English, Arabic, Dutch, French, German, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian Bokmål, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish

※ Product Usage Details
- Recommended Specifications: CPU Quad core 2.3GHz, Ram 2GB
- Minimum Specifications: CPU Quad core 1.5GHz, Ram 1GB

※ Access permission notice for gameplay
STORAGE: The permission is required to store game data and will not access personal files such as photos.
PHONE: The permission is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards and will not affect calls.
CONTACTS: The permission is required to sync your friend list and Google Account.

※ App Notes
- This app requires an active internet connection to play. Please make sure your device is connected while playing.
- Family Farm Seaside is completely free to download and free to play. However, some items in the game can be purchased with real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

description: Barber Shop Simulator 3d lets players live out the fantasy life of a top-level barber!Work your way through twenty five tough levels that increase in difficulty with every new customer that walks through your doors! Think you can shave a man with a cut-throat razor? Can you shape his beard just the way he wants it? Can you turn the mess of facial hair he calls a beard into something truly unique and amazing? Barber Shop Pro 3D will push you to your limit!Your customers don't just want their beards shaved off, they'll want you to give them that perfect moustache - the one that makes them look and feel like a real man - and they'll want it done the only way a professional barber should, with a sharp blade and a steady hand!You'll be scored on your accuracy and your time - shave too much off and you'll lose points. Take too long and you'll lose points. And if your customer isn't completely happy with the job, he'll make sure you don't get paid the full price! The pressure is on!Get that blade under the nose and make sure you follow the contours of your customer's face, there's nothing worse than a nick of a razor on soft skin! You've got a guide image and you've got a selection of razors, and that's all you need save for your skill. How are you at Pencil moustaches? can you shape a Horse Shoe? How about the super tricky Handlebar? They're even trickier to resist pulling on! The Toothbrush, the Walrus, the Pyramid - there's so many moustache styles out there and you're going to have to master them all if you're going to make it to the top of your game!As you progress through the levels, the job gets harder, the time gets shorter and the beard styles get trickier! But to make it easier, you can spend your hard-earned dough on better razors that will do the job in half the time - in the right hands.So get ready to open your doors and welcome your customers in - right here at Barber Shop Simulator 3D where the razors are sharp and the styles are sharper!
descriptionHTML:
Barber Shop Simulator 3d lets players live out the fantasy life of a top-level barber!

Work your way through twenty five tough levels that increase in difficulty with every new customer that walks through your doors! Think you can shave a man with a cut-throat razor? Can you shape his beard just the way he wants it? Can you turn the mess of facial hair he calls a beard into something truly unique and amazing? Barber Shop Pro 3D will push you to your limit!

Your customers don't just want their beards shaved off, they'll want you to give them that perfect moustache - the one that makes them look and feel like a real man - and they'll want it done the only way a professional barber should, with a sharp blade and a steady hand!

You'll be scored on your accuracy and your time - shave too much off and you'll lose points. Take too long and you'll lose points. And if your customer isn't completely happy with the job, he'll make sure you don't get paid the full price! The pressure is on!

Get that blade under the nose and make sure you follow the contours of your customer's face, there's nothing worse than a nick of a razor on soft skin! You've got a guide image and you've got a selection of razors, and that's all you need save for your skill. How are you at Pencil moustaches? can you shape a Horse Shoe? How about the super tricky Handlebar? They're even trickier to resist pulling on! The Toothbrush, the Walrus, the Pyramid - there's so many moustache styles out there and you're going to have to master them all if you're going to make it to the top of your game!

As you progress through the levels, the job gets harder, the time gets shorter and the beard styles get trickier! But to make it easier, you can spend your hard-earned dough on better razors that will do the job in half the time - in the right hands.

So get ready to open your doors and welcome your customers in - right here at Barber Shop Simulator 3D where the razors are sharp and the styles are sharper!

comments: It's a simple little game that allows you to unplug your brain and allow the white noise of the universe wash over you. Not as challenging as Dark Souls. It's not even as challenging as peeling a potato. It does the job of distracting me from the stuff I should be doing.

i was happy to watch ads for in game benefits. then suddenly it said I'd watched all ads and I'd have to try again tomorrow. despite fact that it still threw the random short skippable ads.  needless to say i am pissed and uninstalling

Can't get the first fight to load. Game just freezes. Uninstalled and reinstalled 4 times now...and I still can't even get the very first fight to load. Pretty lame really...I thought this might be a cool game.

It's not really an "automatic crafting game", more a semiautomatic fighting game. Since fighting is the only thing you can start, put your phone down and check on it later.  To actually progress though you'll want to keep using your power ups and launching swords as fast as possible.
I have an issue, any time I tap the battle button it sends me to an empty background where nothing loads but the music so I can't even get past the tutorial... Any way to fix this?

Really great game and doesn't force you to pay to play either. Real fun time waster and is boring like most idle game you actually can fully operate your entire gameplay. Looking forward to seeing where this goes keep up the great work

comments: Play this game if you have all kinds of money and just want to pay to win. There is little fun to be had outside of that.  Update: the developers listened to feedback and have been adding numerous ways to get advantages for free. Here is some respect for listening to your users. Rating increased!

This game is for people who want to spend literally £1000's otherwise your just being constantly attacked, wiped out and then you have to spend weeks/months trying to get back to where you were or maybe a little further. They should make it a little more equal for all. Shame really as the game itself has so much promise.

I overall enjoy the game.  I did the tavern and did a volley for rewards. It showed I won one thing and it gave me another. I took a screen shot of it, sent it to customer service to be compensated.  They say, sorry it was a display error you got the correct rewards. Ummm, no I didn't! It showed I won a valor stone and they gave me a champion stone.  I even had the screen shots to prove it!!  Very unhappy with it and the customer service.  It's not my fault the game glitched, and I should be compensated with what it showed I won. It is NOT my fault the game had a display error.  I have spent money on this game ( more than I will admit) but after the way this was handled,  I will not spend another dime.  Although they probably don't care, as they have shown me already, it is just very disappointing. The way they treat the folks that put the money in their pockets....

I maintain my stance that this game is pay to win. Peaceful, nonpaying lords are punished harshly by higher level lords that just teleport next to you and raid your city until you have nothing left. This problem has been made even worse with the killing event. It lasts 4 whole days and invites so much violence and destruction that small peaceful cities are completely set back to square one by larger more powerful lords. I appreciated the hours I spent into this game, but I cannot support what the developers are doing at this time.
Great game. New problem with update. I can't enter the magic spire. Every time I try, game crashes.

This is the most addictive game I ever played.  Super cool and really fun to play every moment is worth the play. Plus you get to meet so many people all over the world. You become great friends or earth rivals. Thank you for an awesome game and for the interaction with the developers.

Deliver those big hits, wind up a howitzer of a slap-shot and aim a well-timed wrister while playing in 7 thrilling tournaments in HOCKEY NATIONS 18.HEATED RIVALRYSome of the greatest hockey rivalries battle it out in the RIVALS SERIES. Prove you're the one of the best as you climb to the top of the influencers leaderboard.FACE-OFFChoose from 40 North American Teams, 27 Russian League Teams, 19 International Teams or 2 All-Star teams and go head-to-head in a one-off battle on the ice.PLAYOFFSNorth America or Russian Playoffs, the choice is yours. Choose your team and lead them all the way to the Playoff Final. Will you take home the trophy?OUTDOOR SERIESSee the game in a whole new light! Under the cold blue skies of ponds and stadiums, six teams will battle it out to be crowned the OUTDOOR SERIES CHAMPIONS!ImportantThis game is free-to-play but does include optional in-app purchases to access some of the game modes, which can be purchased with real money.Over 80 teams at club and international level.7 exciting tournaments.Motion captured animations.Live Games.Intuitive controls.Tweet with #HN18FIND USWEB: www.distinctivegames.comFACEBOOK: facebook.com/distinctivegamesTWITTER: twitter/distinctivegameYOU TUBE: youtube.com/distinctivegame
descriptionHTML:
Experience the speed and intensity of Ice Hockey with the return of the HOCKEY NATIONS franchise! Deliver those big hits, wind up a howitzer of a slap-shot and aim a well-timed wrister while playing in 7 thrilling tournaments in HOCKEY NATIONS 18.

HEATED RIVALRY
Some of the greatest hockey rivalries battle it out in the RIVALS SERIES. Take control of the game and earn those bragging rights with 50 intense challenges!

DREAM OF GOLD
What better way to enter the world of International Hockey than skating out for your team in the Winter Games! Go stick to stick with some of the greatest teams and come away with the gold medal!

3 ON 3 SUPER SERIES
Six club teams from USA, CANADA and RUSSIA will battle it out to be crowned the 3 ON 3 SUPER SERIES Champions. Which team will you guide to the finals?

LIVE GAMES
Join others and compete in regular LIVE GAMES. Earn points for your team and lead them to victory. Prove you're the one of the best as you climb to the top of the influencers leaderboard.

FACE-OFF
Choose from 40 North American Teams, 27 Russian League Teams, 19 International Teams or 2 All-Star teams and go head-to-head in a one-off battle on the ice.

PLAYOFFS
North America or Russian Playoffs, the choice is yours. Choose your team and lead them all the way to the Playoff Final. Will you take home the trophy?

OUTDOOR SERIES
See the game in a whole new light! Under the cold blue skies of ponds and stadiums, six teams will battle it out to be crowned the OUTDOOR SERIES CHAMPIONS!

Important
This game is free-to-play but does include optional in-app purchases to access some of the game modes, which can be purchased with real money.

Over 80 teams at club and international level.
7 exciting tournaments.
Motion captured animations.
Live Games.
Intuitive controls.

Tweet with #HN18

comments: The developer scammed me out of a Facebook like that promised me a legendary bird if I did it, but I did not receive the promised bird in return. What kind of person would con a kid out of a Facebook like for their own gain. You all will have a special place in hell for what you done to me this cold February night. I hope you live with this guilt for the rest of your life. I hope your first born child in terminally ill at birth. May you never live another happy day in your life.

Cool game! Simple, fun and addictive. One issue though with the in game stary sky. Looks like that part of the background needs to be double buffered or something.. it's pretty twitchy. Overall, good job!
Once again, you guys impress me. I've barely played the game and, like usual, I'm loving it. Really keep up the good work.
Really addictive. Great,  simple game that you may play offline. Bloop games are the best! Birdie trip is also like fish and trip which is also highly addictive. Definitely recommend this for anyone

It's an unbelievably cute game and especially since I love birds! So far so good, just started playing and it's adorable. Hope to see more characters in the future if possible tho!

description: For the sake of making the war technology, the scientists mistakenly install the malware program in the robotic machines. Now robots machines are going to make confrontation with the humans and they are now ruling the humans of the grand city.Robotic machines take the charge of the beautiful grand city in the Multi Iron Eagle Robot vs Robotic Machines action simulation. Gradually evil robots are increases in numbers and these vicious monster robots seems everywhere on the earth. If these unpleasant things happens continuously than we will find the humanity by a chance on earth. The scientists of the world also made a revolutionary change in the multi Iron Hero to save the humanity on earth.Enjoy the most demanding Multi Iron Eagle Robot vs Robotic Machines action simulation that especially designed for the technology and the robotic games lovers. Your favorite multi Iron Hero especially made with steel body and can transform into a robotic eagle bird. Appraise the angst feeling of the people of grand city they are moving towards the safe places because the beautiful city is going to be intensity robotic battle filed. Amazing camera angles and realistic sounds effects made this game to the best robot game. GAMEPLAY:Multi Iron Eagle Robot vs Robotic Machines action simulator contains the futuristic battle missions with the monster weaponry machines and with the dangerous gangsters. Choose your favorite multi Iron Hero with amazing robotic eagle bird against the dynamic robotic battle in the grand city. Playing as a multi Iron Hero, you can attack on the rival’s machines and upon the beast gangsters too with your ice firepower as well as with the nimble martial art combos. You also can change into robotic steel eagle, fly in the air of grand city to watch the vicious activity of the criminals as well as attack on them with the fires. These monster robotic machines contain the bulk of weapons inside them, and they are going to destroy the grand city. The brutal gangsters are behind robotic machines. The rival’s robotic machines can attack with their double fire guns. Moreover, the criminals can attack on you with the powerful martial art combos. You have to show your multi-functional fighting skills and downfall your rivals as soon as possible. Get more score in this futuristic simulation so that you can unlock the other Iron hero and robotic eagles. 3D city environment and realistic battle with machines made this game crazier. Multi Iron Eagle Robot vs Robotic Machines Features:•	Play as multi Iron Hero as well as robotic eagle too.•	Robotic war machines and beast gangsters to fight. •	Crazy transform from Iron Hero to robot eagle bird.•	Amazing robotic eagle flying and fire attack.•	Best RPG and smooth controls.•	Stunning and challenging missions to play.•	Eye catching environment and awesome sounds effects.Control the fantasy of modern technology like, multi iron hero machine with arsenal eagle bird in Multi Iron Eagle Robot vs Robotic Machines action game. This fighting simulation will give you the amazing experience of different martial combos as well as futuristic robotic battle. Fight with the war robotic machines will give you angst and breathtaking feeling while playing this robotic war game. Just grab the free Multi Iron Eagle Robot vs Robotic Machines action simulation and enjoy it.

crafts, hunting, with which you can build and create anything you want

description: Best ancient history adventure! Travel in time to the age of pharaohs, when monument building and pyramid exploration were normal! Enjoy creative crafting & building of a desert city, visit the Sphynx, explore the mummy tombs! The whole ancient world waits to be explored!Get right into the exploration of an ancient city of the pyramids! Have a walk in the desert, watch a beautiful sunset! Visit the sphynx statue, go on an adventure around the pyramids, see the best parts of Egypt! Stroll on the banks of the great river Nile.Become a pharaoh and rule your desert kingdom! Walk among your subjects like a god, destroy buildings as you please, build any kind of monuments you want! This is your world and pyramid building is only one of the possible ways of spending your time. Use the creative mode to unleash the power of your imagination to better the world (or to crush it!). Create, destroy, enjoy!Best free crafting game of 2018! Use blueprints to build ancient monuments that will inspire awe. Simply place one and start filling it with blocks to recreate the most famous ancient egyptian structures that you'll certainly remember from history books. This free building game will also let you use your own imagination to create anything you want. Would you like to see a medieval castle in the middle of the desert? Go for it! Do you want to build your own house? Let's do it! Mine and craft materials from sands and stones.Crafting & building a city will allow you to feel like you've actually traveled in time to the age of ancient Egypt. The hot deserts, sandy buildings and people dressed in robes are all presented using unique blocky graphics that may remind you of other adventure games with building and exploration. All of this is your sandbox where you are free to do as you please. Crafting & building will become your second nature.Look no further - one of the top ancient history city building games is here! Download now and become a pharaoh!
descriptionHTML:
Best ancient history adventure! Travel in time to the age of pharaohs, when monument building and pyramid exploration were normal! Enjoy creative crafting & building of a desert city, visit the Sphynx, explore the mummy tombs! The whole ancient world waits to be explored!

Get right into the exploration of an ancient city of the pyramids! Have a walk in the desert, watch a beautiful sunset! Visit the sphynx statue, go on an adventure around the pyramids, see the best parts of Egypt! Stroll on the banks of the great river Nile.

Become a pharaoh and rule your desert kingdom! Walk among your subjects like a god, destroy buildings as you please, build any kind of monuments you want! This is your world and pyramid building is only one of the possible ways of spending your time. Use the creative mode to unleash the power of your imagination to better the world (or to crush it!). Create, destroy, enjoy!

Best free crafting game of 2018! Use blueprints to build ancient monuments that will inspire awe. Simply place one and start filling it with blocks to recreate the most famous ancient egyptian structures that you'll certainly remember from history books. This free building game will also let you use your own imagination to create anything you want. Would you like to see a medieval castle in the middle of the desert? Go for it! Do you want to build your own house? Let's do it! Mine and craft materials from sands and stones.

Crafting & building a city will allow you to feel like you've actually traveled in time to the age of ancient Egypt. The hot deserts, sandy buildings and people dressed in robes are all presented using unique blocky graphics that may remind you of other adventure games with building and exploration. All of this is your sandbox where you are free to do as you please. Crafting & building will become your second nature.

Look no further - one of the top ancient history city building games is here! Download now and become a pharaoh!

description: Welcome to viking village! Let’s explore racing tracks and prepare for the racing championship. Become a part of viking legend and leave your footprint in the racing history!FUNNY CARSChoose one of the unique viking cars - be sure to try all of them and find your favorite. Play enough to unlock all cars - you will get new hidden car from time to time. All racing cars are well crafted and ready for unpredictable race! They are armored with viking horns and viking shields in case of a  golem attack. MISSIONViking village is the regular place for golem and viking wars. You have to avoid furious golem and viking warriors. They will try to overtake and prevent you from the victory. Watch out for explosive obstacles and falling stones. Drive carefully on wrecked road, jump over the road gaps and overcome muddy road sections.You are the last hope of peaceful vikings. Become a real viking warrior and win this racing championship to finish golem and viking raids. Be aware of viking ships while racing. Mysterious longships can chase you! WHAT TO EXPECT:◆ Intense viking race◆ Funny cars◆ Interesting gameplay◆ Simple controls◆ Full of action viking game◆ Viking vs golem fightsCONTROLSDrive funny cars and enjoy this awesome viking game. There are two worlds: Viking village and Golemberg. Each world contains 12 levels. Challenge yourself and finish them as fast as you can!◆ Ready, set, GO with the start button and enjoy fun viking race.◆ Use ARROW buttons to make cool stunts, front and back flips.◆ Come back to play the game everyday and collect as much coins as you can. Use them to claim new cars and unlock new world. Invite your friends and family members to play viking game together. This viking race game  is free to play for everyone.  EDUCATIONAL VALUEViking race game is good for learning to STIMULATE your reaction, DEVELOP hand-eye coordination, self-preservation and self-control. Enjoy fun car racing and IMPROVE problem solving, quick decision making and flexible thinking skills.MINI GAMESNeed a short break from vikings? Get some rest and play these funny mini games: Balloon Pop, Puzzles, Memory Game, Coloring book and Match Shapes.NOTICEThis game of vikings is completely free to play, but it also offers in-app purchases.◆◆◆ ABOUT TINY LAB GAMES ◆◆◆Tiny Lab Games is a publisher and developer of innovative, high-quality and free-to-play mobile games designed for families. Company is famous for its leading games series Fun Kid Racing. Search Tiny Lab Games on the app store and discover even more fun games!Learn more about Tiny Lab Games and contact us at the following:WEBSITE: http://www.tinylabkids.com FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/TinyLabKids TWITTER: https://twitter.com/TinyLabKids YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/TinyLabKidsPOPJAM: TinyLabKids EMAIL: support@tinylabproductions.com
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to viking village! Let’s explore racing tracks and prepare for the racing championship. Become a part of viking legend and leave your footprint in the racing history!

FUNNY CARS

Choose one of the unique viking cars - be sure to try all of them and find your favorite. Play enough to unlock all cars - you will get new hidden car from time to time. All racing cars are well crafted and ready for unpredictable race! They are armored with viking horns and viking shields in case of a golem attack.

MISSION

Viking village is the regular place for golem and viking wars. You have to avoid furious golem and viking warriors. They will try to overtake and prevent you from the victory. Watch out for explosive obstacles and falling stones. Drive carefully on wrecked road, jump over the road gaps and overcome muddy road sections.

You are the last hope of peaceful vikings. Become a real viking warrior and win this racing championship to finish golem and viking raids.

Be aware of viking ships while racing. Mysterious longships can chase you!

WHAT TO EXPECT:

◆ Intense viking race
◆ Funny cars
◆ Interesting gameplay
◆ Simple controls
◆ Full of action viking game
◆ Viking vs golem fights

CONTROLS

Drive funny cars and enjoy this awesome viking game. There are two worlds: Viking village and Golemberg. Each world contains 12 levels. Challenge yourself and finish them as fast as you can!

◆ Ready, set, GO with the start button and enjoy fun viking race.
◆ Use ARROW buttons to make cool stunts, front and back flips.
◆ Come back to play the game everyday and collect as much coins as you can. Use them to claim new cars and unlock new world.

Invite your friends and family members to play viking game together. This viking race game is free to play for everyone.

EDUCATIONAL VALUE

Viking race game is good for learning to STIMULATE your reaction, DEVELOP hand-eye coordination, self-preservation and self-control. Enjoy fun car racing and IMPROVE problem solving, quick decision making and flexible thinking skills.

MINI GAMES

Need a short break from vikings? Get some rest and play these funny mini games: Balloon Pop, Puzzles, Memory Game, Coloring book and Match Shapes.

NOTICE

This game of vikings is completely free to play, but it also offers in-app purchases.

◆◆◆ ABOUT TINY LAB GAMES ◆◆◆

Tiny Lab Games is a publisher and developer of innovative, high-quality and free-to-play mobile games designed for families. Company is famous for its leading games series Fun Kid Racing. Search Tiny Lab Games on the app store and discover even more fun games!

description: Treefort's Geography Brain Trainer is ideal for students of any age looking to learn and master country names and locations. Become a geography pro in your spare time!Brain TrainingWith an interactive 3d globe, challenging quizzes, and a trophy reward system, the Geography Brain Trainer is a fun yet addictive way to train your brain and build up your geographical knowledge of the world's countries. Working through each difficulty of the Geography Brain Trainer will help you to both easily name a country and pinpoint any country on the globe!The Geography Brain Trainer has two learning challenges:(1)	Name the CountryName the Country will quiz you with different country locations and challenge you to select the correct country. (2)	Find the CountryFind the Country will test your ability to pinpoint a country on the Geography Brain Trainer's interactive globe.TrophiesTrophies are given for each level difficulty in the Geography Brain Trainer: beginner, intermediate, and advanced. To earn a trophy you will first need to work through the world's continents and geographic regions:- Europe- Asia- North and South America- Africa- Oceania Along with a global 'all' challenge to test your mental ability to move between regions. The Geography Brain Trainer is free and can be used offline, with a single one-time purchase to unlock the 'advanced' difficulty setting.Master the Geography Brain Trainer and master the globe!
descriptionHTML:
Treefort's Geography Brain Trainer is ideal for students of any age looking to learn and master country names and locations. Become a geography pro in your spare time!

Brain Training

With an interactive 3d globe, challenging quizzes, and a trophy reward system, the Geography Brain Trainer is a fun yet addictive way to train your brain and build up your geographical knowledge of the world's countries. Working through each difficulty of the Geography Brain Trainer will help you to both easily name a country and pinpoint any country on the globe!

The Geography Brain Trainer has two learning challenges:

(1) Name the Country

Name the Country will quiz you with different country locations and challenge you to select the correct country.

(2) Find the Country

Find the Country will test your ability to pinpoint a country on the Geography Brain Trainer's interactive globe.

Trophies

Trophies are given for each level difficulty in the Geography Brain Trainer: beginner, intermediate, and advanced. To earn a trophy you will first need to work through the world's continents and geographic regions:

- Europe
- Asia
- North and South America
- Africa
- Oceania

Along with a global 'all' challenge to test your mental ability to move between regions. The Geography Brain Trainer is free and can be used offline, with a single one-time purchase to unlock the 'advanced' difficulty setting.

Master the Geography Brain Trainer and master the globe!

description: You will really feel like you are behind the wheel of a muscle car. Cruise around the city in your car with friends, and experience how cool and difficult it can be at the same time. Drive carefully in order to avoid crashing or damaging your muscle car. 2. Beware of the traffic police. If you speed, then you will get a ticket. 3. Pay attention to the interactive hints.  4. Don't forget to fill up your car with gas at the gas station.5. It is cheaper to pay a bribe than the official ticket.  6. For your convenience, please keep the doors locked when driving. Do your best refles and master this game!
Adventure Despicable banana dash : minion jump is a fun and addictive games. The best |despicable subway rush| adventures |minion rush| for your pass time.

HOW TO PLAY :

Range Button – Throw apple to kill minion banana enemies
Jump Button – To jump with your epic minion
Use Special skill to kill enemies
Collect banana for range gru minions attack
Defeat all the minion boss to complete a world

GAME FEATURES:
4 WORLD, 60 LEVELS, 12 BOSS STAGE
Fun, exciting gameplay
Top free |despicable me| adventure game
Colorful graphics
Simple and easy control
Suitable for all age

Download and enjoy this great minion banana lovers game for free today!
